item.title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn
item.description:
Title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: A44 Games
Publisher: Kepler Interactive
Franchise: Flintlock
Release Date: Jul 17, 2024




About This Game

From games studio A44, makers of Ashen, comes an explosive Souls-lite, where Gods and guns collide in a battle for the future of humanity.

The Door to the Great Below has been opened unleashing the Gods and their armies of the Dead. The lands of Kian are besieged, the city of Dawn is on the brink of destruction. It’s time for the Coalition army to fight back. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic as you embark on an epic journey to defeat the Gods, close the door and retake the world.

Kill all gods.
Your battle begins now.


Step into the boots of Nor Vanek, an elite member of the Coalition army, joined by Enki, a mysterious fox-like companion, in their quest for vengeance against the Gods. Guided by Enki who shares his knowledge of the world with you, your combat skills and traversal capabilities will be imbued with his magical powers making you a duo to be reckoned with.

Flintlock retains elements of the souls-like genre and infuses it with rapid mobility resulting in dynamic and explosive combat. Weave in melee, gunpowder and magic in rhythmic battles where combos chain together to create a deadly dance. Use Nor's gunpowder abilities to exploit verticality to your advantage and deal death from above, or quickly recover from danger.

Unleashed upon the world, the vengeful Gods are on a rampage, intent on causing chaos and the downfall of mankind. Traverse the ravaged landscape of Kian, utilizing Enki's magic and portals to soar through the skies while confronting hordes of the undead. Discover new equipment, strengthen your weapons, and upgrade your gear in anticipation of the ultimate showdown against the Gods.


Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Violence against supernatural creatures
Violence against humans



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580 (6GB+ RAM)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 2060 Super / Radeon RX 5700 (8GB+ RAM)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD

item.title: Crestfallen: Medieval Survival
item.description:
Title: Crestfallen: Medieval Survival
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , RPG , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Bloodbath Studios
Publisher: Bloodbath Studios
Release Date: Jul 17, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jul 17, 2024




About This Game



Q. What kind of game is this?

A. Crestfallen: Medieval Survival is an immersive RPG set in a richly detailed medieval open world.

Build and defend vast castles, engage in strategic battles, and manage resources to thrive. Equip your knights with powerful armor and weapons, conquer fierce enemies, and explore a land filled with magical creatures and epic quests. Whether playing solo or with friends, experience the ultimate medieval fantasy and carve your legacy in the realm.



Singleplayer or Multiplayer Modes

Build Thy Kingdom:


A Humble Abode - Begin with a small Keep, a hovel from wood and plaster, then progress through different tiers of materials to strengthen the fortifications against assault.

Modular Castle Construction - Craft and connect modular castle pieces to build impressive fortresses tailored to your strategic needs. Place towering walls, turrets, and gate houses that snap together to ensure Thy Crest is well protected. *Train or hire mercenary archers and knights to patrol these fortifications. *(Still under development)


Expansive Crafting System - Utilize various workshops like The Work Bench, The Forge and Anvil, The Black Cauldron, Alchemy Lab, Spinning Wheels, Leatherworks, and many more. Progress your crafting skills and discovered valuable materials to make the most extraordinary items.



The Crest Hath Fallen - The Crest is a claim that you craft and place down when you start building, it secures a large area of land that only you and your allies can build on. After the crest is placed only those authorized on it can open doors and build on the land you have secured. Do what you must to protect Thy Crest at all costs, it must not fall!

The Path of Destiny Awaits Thee:




Progression System - Customize your character's growth with a detailed skill tree, allocating skill and attribute points to match your unique playstyle. Whether you specialize in melee combat, master the arcane arts, or create a hybrid build, the possibilities are endless. Tailor your abilities to become the ultimate warrior, mage, or anything in between.

Magical Elements to Unleash - Harness the power of the elements with spells at your command. Learn to conjure and control potent magic, from blazing fire to chilling ice and beyond.

Medieval Inspired Melee & Ranged Combat - Master the art of medieval warfare. Wield a sword and shield, dominate with heavy two-handed weapons, or perfect your aim with a bow and arrow or crossbow.

Explore the Lore of Tyraellia - Embark on optional quests scattered and hidden throughout the realm. Uncover the rich stories that unfold as you aid various factions. Delving into deep quest lines may yield rewards beyond your wildest dreams.

Farm, Trade, and Loot | Economic Prosperity:


Cultivate Crops and Farm Life - Tend to a variety of crops to fulfill your kingdom's needs. Seeds must be carefully nurtured, and farmers diligently attend to their fields, ensuring a bountiful harvest to sustain your realm.

Trade System - Engage with local vendors and merchants to bolster your economic strength. Barter and trade lore-specific items across various regions, fortifying your kingdom’s prosperity. Sell the surplus of goods you may accumulate or purchase the ones you struggle to acquire.

Interactive Open World - Every tree may be felled, nearly every rock can be mined, and countless treasures await looting. We endeavor to craft a world fully ripe for exploration and interaction, providing a truly immersive experience.

Press The Assault and Siege:


Siege Weapons - Master the construction of powerful siege engines such as ballistas, catapults, and trebuchets. Lay waste to opposing castles and fortresses, strategically dismantling their defenses from a distance.

Standing Army - Rally a formidable army comprised of allies and valiant soldiers. Prepare to lay siege to enemy strongholds, bringing your finest weapons and mightiest warriors. Strategize and coordinate attacks, risking all for the glory and honor of your kingdom. Through unity and strength, conquer foes and claim victory in epic battles that will be spoken of for generations. Embrace the perilous path of warfare, where only the brave shall prevail and the rewards of conquest await those who dare to lead.

Serve Justice and Vanquish Evil:


Bandits and Thieves - Ever vigilant must thou be, for enemies lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike and plunder thy treasures. Do not leave thy door open!

Demonic Foes and Monsters - Stand ready to confront a myriad of vile creatures and formidable adversaries, including dragons, orcs, demons, and knights that have forgotten their Sacred Oath. Battle against insidious cultists, savage barbarians, elusive elves, and resilient dwarves.



Duty of Chivalry - In this perilous realm, serve justice with unwavering resolve, vanquishing evil wherever it may dwell. Embrace the heroic path, safeguarding the land and upholding the honor of thy kingdom. It is thy solemn duty to exemplify chivalry throughout the land.

March forth to glorious victory! JUSTICE WILL BE SERVED!!



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The medieval times were a violent time and in our game we have fighting with swords, weapons, and magic that can get bloody and violent. Please be aware this is a player vs. player based game so you may be attacked when trying to build a kingdom or adventuring out past the safe zones.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7
    • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1070ti
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10, 11
    • Processor: Intel i5 or better
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX 3060ti
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space

item.title: Bō: Path of the Teal Lotus
item.description:
Title: Bō: Path of the Teal Lotus
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Squid Shock Studios , Christopher Stair , Trevor Youngquist
Publisher: Humble Games
Franchise: Humble Games , Squid Shock Studios
Release Date: Jul 17, 2024




About This Game

DRIFT DOWN FROM THE CELESTIAL REALM


Flow with acrobatic grace and agility through a mysterious world of myth and legend in Bō: Path of the Teal Lotus, a colorful hand-drawn adventure inspired by Japanese folklore.

Undertake a mystical journey as Bō, a celestial blossom (fox tentaihana) descended from the heavens to fulfill a mysterious ancient prophecy. Use your legendary bō staff to bounce and glide fluidly through an otherworldly realm of hand-drawn, dreamlike landscapes, strange and adorable yokai, and massive monsters summoned from ancient legends of Japan.

DISCOVER A MYSTERIOUS AND HAUNTED WORLD

Explore a diverse and interconnected world in a 2.5D side-scrolling action-platformer with Metroidvania elements. Journey to a haunted castle, a thriving Japanese-inspired metropolis, and many more strange and wondrous places—then find ways to travel back and fully explore newly unlocked paths and surprises.

FIND YOUR FLOW

Navigate the world’s platforming challenges with acrobatic precision, elegance, and finesse. Use Bō’s distinctive move-and-reset system to reach new areas efficiently or recover when your footing flounders.

MASTER NEW STAFF TRANSFORMATIONS

Brew and drink arcane teas to unlock powerful new abilities for Bō’s shapeshifting staff. Mash foes with the Mochi Mallet, unlock new movement techniques like the Lotus Dash and Grappling Gun, and gracefully power up along your journey.

COLLECT POWERFUL DARUMA ALLIES

Each colorful Daruma doll you discover can be upgraded and summoned to the battlefield, where these adorable and powerful allies can deploy spells and other spectacular abilities to aid you in combat.

DRAWN FROM A DREAM

Explore a vibrant 2.5D vision that blends the beauty of paintings, the personality of hand-drawn illustrations, and the elegance of papercraft.

SPIRITED CAST OF ALLIES AND ENEMIES

Engage with a larger-than-life cast of bizarre and adorable yokai (supernatural spirits from Japanese folklore) and other original characters inspired by Japanese myth, all brought to life with traditional hand-drawn 2D frame-by-frame animation. Help them with their side quests—or just stop by for a chat and a cup of tea.

MYTHIC BOSS BATTLES

Challenge massive, awe-inspiring monsters drawn from Japanese folklore! You’ll need to call upon all of the knowledge and acrobatic skill you’ve gained to vanquish these powerful adversaries and advance further in your quest.

MOVE TO THE MUSIC

Drift along to the music of a gorgeous original score composed by Moisés Camargo, blending traditional Japanese instrumentation with modern orchestral music.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: 10
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 2 GB or Intel UHD Graphics
    • Additional Notes: Low 1080p @ 30 FPS
    Recommended:
    • OS: 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 or AMD FX-4300
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB or Intel Iris Xe Graphics
    • Additional Notes: High 1080p @ 60 FPS

item.title: Nobody Wants to Die
item.description:
Title: Nobody Wants to Die
Genre: Adventure
Developer: Critical Hit Games
Publisher: PLAION
Franchise: Nobody Wants to Die
Release Date: Jul 17, 2024




About This Game


Lose yourself in the world of New York, 2329, where immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. Following a near-death experience, Detective James Karra takes an off-the-books case from his chief with only the help of a young police liaison, Sara Kai, to assist him. Time reveals all as they risk everything in pursuit of a killer, uncovering the dark secrets of the city's elite.





Experience a noir adventure in an alternate future of New York City in 2329; technology has advanced to offer humans eternal life, allowing consciousness to be stored in memory banks or transferred from one body to another. That is, if you can afford the subscription.





See through the eyes of Mortality Department Detective James Karra on his hunt for a serial killer who targets the city’s elite citizens. Investigate crime scenes using his time manipulation augmentation and advanced technology to reconstruct events leading up to each murder and uncover clues that lead to the horrifying truth behind the murders.





Lose yourself in a dystopian future through this meaningful and original interactive detective story, that explores the dangers of transhumanism and immortality. In a world of eternal life and vanishing morality, you, a hardened detective, must navigate the lines of right and wrong in a society where death is a distant memory.





Utilising the power of Unreal Engine 5, Nobody Wants to Die pushes the boundaries of storytelling, combining photorealistic graphics and a distinctly unique narrative experience.





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains strong language, violence, blood and gore, as well as nudity and sexual material. Individuals suffering from depression may not have a safe experience playing this game.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core I3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56 or Intel Arc A750
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT or Intel Arc A770
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 30 GB available space

item.title: TerraScape
item.description:
Title: TerraScape
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Bitfall Studios
Publisher: Stray Fawn Publishing , INSTINCT3
Release Date: Jul 17, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Apr 5, 2023




About This Game


Make yourself comfortable and build a gorgeous Kingdom in TerraScape. Place buildings strategically for score and exciting new unlocks in a peaceful and atmospheric world. No time pressure here, take your time and puzzle away!


Place your Keep and start growing your kingdom by choosing your first Deck of buildings.
Strategically place your buildings to unlock more buildings, more draws, and new Keep upgrades to choose additional Decks that synergize well with what you already have. Each building benefits from different influences, be it other buildings and natural resources nearby, or the right biome to place it on. Earn points by collecting as many positive influences as possible, but beware: there are also negative influences!

Watch your kingdom grow from a humble hamlet to a majestic metropolis and make sure that you always have a steady supply of points for your next draw to keep the game in motion.

Let yourself be captivated by the unique graphic style and the lovingly designed landscapes.
Observe the birds, the bees and the citizens of your flourishing and idyllic kingdom while listening to our relaxing soundtrack.

In TerraScape, you define the tempo, so sit back, relax, and experience the cozy city puzzler vibe.



Combine buildings in special patterns to merge mighty complexes. These Merged Buildings are impressive structures that have stronger influences and can reward you with bonus points, extra cards or even trigger special effects! Find over a dozen Merged Buildings and utilize them to the fullest!

Multiplayer

Get into engaging multiplayer matches with your friends! Develop your own strategies and defeat the plans of your opponents in Versus mode. Take advantage of strategically placed buildings and build up your point lead round by round. Or coordinate strategies with each other in Coop mode and max out your kingdom by working together.
Those seeking a challenge can conquer the highscores by strategically planning and carefully building their settlement to earn a place on the global leaderboards.

What does TerraScape offer:

  • Unique blend of City Builder and Puzzle Game
  • Relaxing and atmospheric gameplay
  • Many unlockables and more to come
  • 40+ Buildings
  • 15+ Combination-Buildings
  • Highscores & Leaderboards
  • High Replay Value
  • Great Soundtrack
  • Coop & Versus Multiplayer

What does TerraScape NOT offer:

  • Resource Management
  • 4x Strategy
  • Citizen Simulation
  • Combat
  • Free Deck building


  • Kingdom Mode – Our main mode: Play until you run out of points and buildings
  • Scenarios – Play with special conditions and goals to achieve
  • Puzzle Terras – 40+ progressively more difficult levels: Place fixed sets of buildings in the most optimal way
  • Weekly Challenges – Stay at the top of the leaderbords of these Puzzle Terras while they are active to become immortalized!
  • Coop Multiplayer – Play Kingdom Mode together with up to 4 players
  • Versus Multiplayer – Up to 4 players face each other to see who achieves the Target Score first!
  • Creative Mode – Build your kingdom without limits and with everything available. Just build away!




Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7,8, 10
    • Processor: 1,8 GHz Dual Core
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 760
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Sound Card
    • Additional Notes: Screen Aspect Ratio: 4:3, 16:9, 16:10 and higher
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7,8, 10
    • Processor: 2.8Ghz Dual Core or better
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1060 or similar
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Sound Card
    • Additional Notes: Screen Aspect Ratio: 4:3, 16:9, 16:10 and higher
